name: Potential Mpclient.DLL Sideloading
description: Detects potential sideloading of "mpclient.dll" by Windows Defender processes ("MpCmdRun" and "NisSrv") from their non-default directory.
author: Bhabesh Raj

detection.query:
selection: {"ImageLoaded|endswith": "\\mpclient.dll", "Image|endswith": ["\\MpCmdRun.exe", "\\NisSrv.exe"]}
filter_main_known_locations: {"Image|startswith": ["C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Windows Defender\\", "C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft Security Client\\", "C:\\Program Files\\Windows Defender\\", "C:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows Defender\\Platform\\", "C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\"]}
